text: The Ministry of Communications and Information Technology (; abbreviated MCIT) administers Myanmar's communications and information technology policies. The ministry was formerly known as the Ministry of Communications, Posts and Telegraphs. The Ministry was organized as Ministry of Transport and Communication by Htin Kyaw's Cabinet in 2016. ==See also== * Economy of Myanmar * Cabinet of Myanmar ==References== ==External links== * Official website Category:Government ministries of Myanmar Category:Communications ministries Category:Information ministries Category:Communications in Myanmar
title: Ministry of Communications and Information Technology (Myanmar)
